      • getEventStats

        @Deprecated
public List<EventStat> getEventStats(String siteId,
                                       List<String> events,
                                       String searchKey,
                                       Date iDate,
                                       Date fDate)
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from interface: StatsManager
        This method is deprecated and will be removed in version 2.1. Use #getEventStats(String, List, Date, Date, List, boolean, PagingPosition, String, String, boolean) instead.
        Get event statistics grouped by user, site and event.
        Specified by:
        getEventStats in interface StatsManager
        Parameters:
        siteId - The site ID
        events - List of events to get statistics for (see StatsManager.getPreferences(String, boolean), EventRegistryService)
        searchKey - An user ID, first or last name
        iDate - The initial date
        fDate - The final date
        Returns:
        a list of EventStat objects
